name: SPEC / OUT Workflow Template
description: Packages SPEC deliverables so VERIFY can audit and prep for DELIVER stage.
inputs: job.stage MUST equal SPEC and job.subflow MUST equal OUT.
SPEC PROCESS artifacts MUST be current and approved.
Lock MUST stay active and guards MUST remain TRUE; job.halted MUST be FALSE.
Plan approval status MUST be tracked so VERIFY can request it later.
steps: Summarize key specification decisions, interface matrices, and outstanding questions into artifact_path.
Link every major deliverable (spec_path, registry files, diagrams) with checksums or timestamps for traceability.
Highlight items that MUST be handled during VERIFY (e.g., missing approvals, open questions).
Confirm storage paths are reachable from both Windows and WSL; update artifact_path accordingly.
outputs: artifact_path enumerating SPEC deliverables, approvals, and pending actions.
Updated spec_path cross-referenced with acceptance evidence.
acceptance: All SPEC deliverables MUST be listed with storage paths and verification status.
Pending issues MUST include owners and target resolution windows.
Outputs MUST be versioned or timestamped for auditable DELIVER entry.
